spirit:register.spirit:name: sc1
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Status and Control Registers 1

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion is not completed.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion is completed.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion complete interrupt is disabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion complete interrupt is enabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Single-ended conversions and input channels are selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Differential conversions and input channels are selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, DADP0 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD0 is selected as input. AD0 is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, DADP1 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD1 is selected as input. AD1 is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, DADP2 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD2 is selected as input. AD2 is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, DADP3 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, DAD3 is selected as input. AD3 is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x64
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD4 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x65
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD5 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x6E
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD6 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x6F
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD7 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x3E8
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD8 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x3E9
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD9 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x3F2
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD10 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x3F3
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD11 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x44C
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD12 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x44D
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD13 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x456
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD14 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x457
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD15 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2710
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD16 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2711
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD17 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x271A
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD18 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x271B
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD19 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2774
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD20 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2775
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD21 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x277E
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD22 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x277F
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, AD23 is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2AF8
spirit:values.spirit:description: Reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2AF9
spirit:values.spirit:description: Reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B02
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, Temp Sensor (single-ended) is selected as input; when DIFF=1, Temp Sensor (differential) is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B03
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0, Bandgap VREF\_OUT (single-ended) is selected as input; when DIFF=1, Bandgap VREF\_OUT (differential) is selected as input.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B5C
spirit:values.spirit:description: Reserved.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B5D
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0,VREFSH is selected as input; when DIFF=1, -VREFSH (differential) is selected as input. Voltage reference selected is determined by SC2\[REFSEL\].

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B66
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0,VREFSL is selected as input; when DIFF=1, it is reserved. Voltage reference selected is determined by SC2\[REFSEL\].

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x2B67
spirit:values.spirit:description: Module is disabled.

spirit:register.spirit:name: cfg1
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Configuration Register 1

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Normal power configuration.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Low-power configuration. The power is reduced at the expense of maximum clock speed.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: The divide ratio is 1 and the clock rate is input clock.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: The divide ratio is 2 and the clock rate is (input clock)/2.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: The divide ratio is 4 and the clock rate is (input clock)/4.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: The divide ratio is 8 and the clock rate is (input clock)/8.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Short sample time.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Long sample time.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 8-bit conversion; when DIFF=1, it is differential 9-bit conversion with 2\'s complement output.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 12-bit conversion ; when DIFF=1, it is differential 13-bit conversion with 2\'s complement output.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 10-bit conversion. ; when DIFF=1, it is differential 11-bit conversion with 2\'s complement output

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: When DIFF=0:It is single-ended 16-bit conversion..; when DIFF=1, it is differential 16-bit conversion with 2\'s complement output Reserved. Do not set the field to this value.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Bus clock

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Alternate clock 2 (ALTCLK2) Bus clock divided by 2(BUSCLK/2)

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: Alternate clock (ALTCLK)

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: Asynchronous clock (ADACK)

spirit:register.spirit:name: cfg2
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Configuration Register 2

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: ADxxa channels are selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: ADxxb channels are selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Asynchronous clock output disabled; Asynchronous clock is enabled only if selected by ADICLK and a conversion is active.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Asynchronous clock and clock output is enabled regardless of the state of the ADC.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Normal conversion sequence selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: High-speed conversion sequence selected with 2 additional ADCK cycles to total conversion time.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Default longest sample time; 20 extra ADCK cycles; 24 ADCK cycles total.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: 12 extra ADCK cycles; 16 ADCK cycles total sample time.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: 6 extra ADCK cycles; 10 ADCK cycles total sample time.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: 2 extra ADCK cycles; 6 ADCK cycles total sample time.

spirit:register.spirit:name: r
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Data Result Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: cv
spirit:register.spirit:description: Compare Value Registers

spirit:register.spirit:name: sc2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Status and Control Register 2

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion not in progress.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Conversion in progress.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Software trigger selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Hardware trigger selected.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Compare function disabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Compare function enabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Configures less than threshold, outside range not inclusive and inside range not inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Configures greater than or equal to threshold, outside and inside ranges inclusive; functionality based on the values placed in CV1 and CV2.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Range function disabled. Only CV1 is compared. \{27}

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Range function enabled. Both CV1 and CV2 are compared. \{27}

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: DMA is disabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: DMA is enabled and will assert the ADC DMA request during an ADC conversion complete event noted when any of the SC1n\[COCO\] flags is asserted.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Default voltage reference pin pair, that is, external pins VREFH and VREFL

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Alternate reference pair, that is, VALTH and VALTL . This pair may be additional external pins or internal sources depending on the MCU configuration. See the chip configuration information for details specific to this MCU

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: Internal bandgap reference and associated ground reference (V BGH and V BGL ). Consult the Chip Configuration information for details specific to this MCU. Reserved

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: Reserved - Selects default voltage reference (V REFH and V REFL ) pin pair.

spirit:register.spirit:name: sc3
spirit:register.spirit:description: Status and Control Register 3

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Calibration completed normally.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Calibration failed. ADC accuracy specifications are not guaranteed.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Writes to ADCSC1 COCO bit don\'t have an affect on ADTRG.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Writes to ADCSC1 COCO bit will be reflected into ADTRG register. Note: When ASSITRGEN is set, writes to ADCSC1 are delayed by 1/2 bus cycle to allow ADCSC1 COCO write to be updated in ADTRG register so conversion type can be correctly generated (software if coco write is 1\'b0 causing ADTRG to clear or hardware type if coco write is 1\'b1.). Note: User must ensure no hardware trigger is generated between the time ADCSC1 COCO bit is written if value of ADTRG will change to guarantee correct conversion type is generated.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: One conversion or one set of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled, that is, AVGE=1, after initiating a conversion.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Continuous conversions or sets of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled, that is, AVGE=1, after initiating a conversion.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: Hardware average function disabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: Hardware average function enabled.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x0
spirit:values.spirit:description: 4 samples averaged.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0x1
spirit:values.spirit:description: 8 samples averaged.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xA
spirit:values.spirit:description: 16 samples averaged.

spirit:values.spirit:name: val_0xB
spirit:values.spirit:description: 32 samples averaged.

spirit:register.spirit:name: ofs
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Offset Correction Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: pg
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side Gain Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: mg

spirit:register.spirit:name: clpd
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clps

spirit:register.spirit:name: clp4

spirit:register.spirit:name: clp3
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clp2
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clp1
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clp0
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clmd
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clms
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clm4
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clm3
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clm2
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clm1
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

spirit:register.spirit:name: clm0
spirit:register.spirit:description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register
